twitter.description: The insurance CEO is preparing the company for implementation of the Affordable Care Act. Aetna (AET) is the third-largest U.S. insurer behind WellPoint (WLP) and UnitedHealth Group (UNH).
twitter.title: The Health-Care Reformer
